com.dor.coupons.system.tables

Interface CompanyRepo

  • All Superinterfaces:
    org.springframework.data.repository.CrudRepository<Company,java.lang.Long>, org.springframework.data.repository.Repository<Company,java.lang.Long>

    public interface CompanyRepo
extends org.springframework.data.repository.CrudRepository<Company,java.lang.Long>

    This CompanyRepo is the basic way to communicate with the Company table in the database.

    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Dor aharon

    • Method Summary

    • Method Detail

      • findCompanyByName

        @Query(value="SELECT * FROM COMPANY WHERE name = :name",
       nativeQuery=true)
Company findCompanyByName(@Param(value="name")
                                                                                                              java.lang.String name)
        This findCompanyByName search for a company object with the given name and if exists returns it.
        Parameters:
        name - The given company name you want to get from the database.
        Returns:
        Company object with the given name.

      • existsByName

        boolean existsByName(java.lang.String name)
        This existsByName checks if a Company object with the given name exists in the database.
        Parameters:
        name - The given company name you want to check if exists in the database.
        Returns:
        Boolean of True if company with the given name exists or false if not.

      • existsByNameAndPassword

        boolean existsByNameAndPassword(java.lang.String name,
                                java.lang.String password)

        This existsByNameAndPassword checks if a Company object with the given name and password exists in the database.

        Main use in login method.

        Parameters:
        name - The given company name you want to check if exists in the database.
        password - The given company password you want to check if exists in the database.
        Returns:
        Boolean of true if company with the given name and password exists or false if not.

      • getCouponByCompanyIdAndCouponId

        @Query(value="SELECT coupon FROM COMPANY COMP INNER JOIN COMP.coupons AS coupon WHERE COMP.id = :company_id AND coupon.id = :coupon_id")
Coupon getCouponByCompanyIdAndCouponId(@Param(value="company_id")
                                                                                                                                                                                 long company_id,
                                                                                                                                                                                 @Param(value="coupon_id")
                                                                                                                                                                                 long coupon_id)

        This getCouponByCompanyIdAndCouponId get Coupon object with the given coupon id.

        The coupon belongs to the company with the given company id.

        Parameters:
        company_id - The id of the company that the coupon belong to her.
        coupon_id - The id of the coupon you want to get from the database.
        Returns:
        Coupon object with the given coupon id that belongs to the company with the given company id.

      • getCouponByCompanyIdAndCouponTitle

        @Query(value="SELECT coupon FROM COMPANY COMP INNER JOIN COMP.coupons AS coupon WHERE COMP.id = :company_id AND coupon.title = :coupon_title")
Coupon getCouponByCompanyIdAndCouponTitle(@Param(value="company_id")
                                                                                                                                                                                          long company_id,
                                                                                                                                                                                          @Param(value="coupon_title")
                                                                                                                                                                                          java.lang.String coupon_title)

        This getCouponByCompanyIdAndCouponTitle get Coupon object with the given coupon title.

        The coupon belongs to the company with the given company id.

        Parameters:
        company_id - The id of the company that the coupon belongs to her.
        coupon_title - The title of the coupon you want to get from the database.
        Returns:
        Coupon object with the given coupon title that belongs to the company with the given company id.

      • getCouponsByType

        @Query(value="SELECT coupon FROM COMPANY COMP INNER JOIN COMP.coupons AS coupon WHERE COMP.id = :company_id AND coupon.type = :coupon_type")
java.util.Collection<Coupon> getCouponsByType(@Param(value="company_id")
                                                                                                                                                                                            long company_id,
                                                                                                                                                                                            @Param(value="coupon_type")
                                                                                                                                                                                            CouponType couponType)

        This getCouponsByType get collection of all Coupon objects with the given coupon type.

        The coupons belong to the company with the given company id.

        Parameters:
        company_id - The id of the company that the coupons belong to her.
        couponType - Enum of the coupons type you want to get from the database.
        Returns:
        Collection of all Coupon objects with the given coupon type that belongs to the company with the given company id.

      • getCouponsByTopPrice

        @Query(value="SELECT coupon FROM COMPANY COMP INNER JOIN COMP.coupons AS coupon WHERE COMP.id = :company_id AND coupon.price <= :coupon_price")
java.util.Collection<Coupon> getCouponsByTopPrice(@Param(value="company_id")
                                                                                                                                                                                                   long company_id,
                                                                                                                                                                                                   @Param(value="coupon_price")
                                                                                                                                                                                                   double coupon_price)

        This getCouponsByTopPrice get collection of all Coupon objects whose price is lower or equal to a given price.

        The coupons belong to the company with the given company id.

        Parameters:
        company_id - The id of the company that the coupons belong to her.
        coupon_price - The price limit of the coupons you want to get from the database.
        Returns:
        Collection of all Coupon objects whose price is lower or equal to a given price and belongs to the company with the given company id.

      • getCouponsByEndDate

        @Query(value="SELECT coupon FROM COMPANY COMP INNER JOIN COMP.coupons AS coupon WHERE COMP.id = :company_id AND coupon.endDate <= :coupon_endDate")
java.util.Collection<Coupon> getCouponsByEndDate(@Param(value="company_id")
                                                                                                                                                                                                      long company_id,
                                                                                                                                                                                                      @Param(value="coupon_endDate")
                                                                                                                                                                                                      java.util.Date coupon_endDate)

        This getCouponsByEndDate get collection of all Coupon objects whose end date is before and same with given date.

        The coupons belong to the company with the given company id.

        Parameters:
        company_id - The id of the company that the coupons belong to her.
        coupon_endDate - The expiration date limit of the coupons you want to get from the database.
        Returns:
        Collection of all Coupon objects whose end date is before and same with given date and belongs to the company with the given company id.
